forms.dropFile: Drop File here or Choose File to upload
forms.testdataRule1: Put all the input/output files in a single `.zip` file, and follow the naming rules below.
forms.testdataRule2: Name the input file as "sstt.in", where "ss" represents the number of subtasks it belongs to, and "tt" represents which testcase it is in subtask.
forms.testdataRule3: Similarly, name the ouput file as "sstt.out", NOTE THAT "ss" & "tt" are zero-indexed.
forms.testdataRule4: For example, a problem with 3 subtasks, and the number of testcases of each subtask is 3, 5, 15, respectively.
forms.testdataRule5: The content of zip file is:

hovers.setDescription: Set the problem description, including title, content, example test cases, etc.
hovers.setConfiguration: Configure basic settings like problem name, quota, allowed languages, etc.
hovers.allowedLanguages: Select the programming languages allowed for students.
hovers.maxZipSize: Set the maximum size limit (MB) for student ZIP uploads.
hovers.tags: Set tags for the problem to facilitate categorization and search (comma separated).
hovers.quota: Set the submission limit per student count, -1 means unlimited.
hovers.aiTA: Enable AI Teaching Assistant, allowing students to get hints via AI.
hovers.aiModel: Select the model version used by the AI assistant.
hovers.selectAPIKeys: Select API keys available for this problem (multiple selection allowed).
hovers.activeAiKeys: Currently active API keys, will be used in rotation.
hovers.inactiveAiKeys: Inactive API keys (drag to active list to enable).
hovers.trialMode: Enable Trial Mode, allowing students to test run their code before formal submission.
hovers.trialMaxNumber: Set the execution limit for Trial Mode, -1 means unlimited.
hovers.resultVisible: Allow students to view detailed results and error messages of trial runs.
hovers.resultDownloadable: Allow students to download output files from trial runs (only valid if result is visible).
hovers.uploadPublicTestData: Upload public test data ZIP for Trial Mode (containing .in and .out files).
hovers.networkSidecars: Configure Sidecar containers to provide extra network services.
hovers.networkAccessModel: Blacklist (Default allow undefined) or Whitelist (Default block undefined).
hovers.networkAccessIPList: Set the list of allowed or blocked IP addresses.
hovers.networkAccessURLList: Set the list of allowed or blocked URLs.
hovers.SandboxEnvironment: Configure the sandbox environment and Docker image for execution.
hovers.Sidecars: Configure auxiliary containers (Sidecars) running alongside the main program.
hovers.dockerFiles: Upload custom Dockerfile to build the execution environment.
hovers.sideCarImage: Docker image name used by the Sidecar.
hovers.sideCarArgs: Startup arguments passed to the Sidecar container.
hovers.sideCarEnv: Environment variables for the Sidecar container.
hovers.ArtifactCollection: Set files to be collected from the execution environment (Artifacts).
hovers.StudentArtifact: Collect specific files generated by student code.
hovers.setPipelines: Configure the code compilation and execution pipeline.
hovers.fileAccess: Set file system access permissions for student code.
hovers.libraryRestrictionsGroup1: Set static analysis and library usage restrictions.
hovers.libraryRestrictionsGroup2: Set advanced library and syntax restrictions.
hovers.importsRestrictions: Restrict modules (Imports) that Python scripts can import.
hovers.headersRestrictions: Restrict headers (Headers) that C/C++ programs can include.
hovers.functionsRestrictions: Restrict specific functions the program can call.
hovers.syntaxRestrictions: Restrict syntax structures the program can use (e.g., for, while, etc.).
hovers.executionMode: Select program execution mode (General, Interactive, etc.).
hovers.executionModeFuncitonOnly: Function Only Mode: Students implement specific functions (LeetCode style).
hovers.executionModeInteractive: Interactive Mode: Student program needs to interact with a judge program.
hovers.uploadFile: Upload related files (e.g., Makefile, Header, etc.).
hovers.interactiveTeacherFirsts: Interactive Mode Setting: Whether to execute teacher's code first.
hovers.interactiveUploadTeacherCode: Upload teacher's code (Interactor) for Interactive Mode.
hovers.setDataZipFile: Upload ZIP file containing all test data.
hovers.setResourceDataStudent: Upload resource files accessible to students.
hovers.setResourceDataTeacher: Upload resource files for judging use only.
